001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders;
002
003import org.slf4j.Logger;
004import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
005import static org.apache.commons.codec.digest.HmacUtils.hmacSha256;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.crypto.AllZeroSecureRandom;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.crypto.Hkdf;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.crypto.HmacSha256;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake1aRequest;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake1bRequest;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake2Request;
014import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake3SessionKeyRequest;
015import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake4KeyConfirmationRequest;
016import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.Jpake1aResponse;
017import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.Jpake1bResponse;
018import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.Jpake2Response;
019import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.Jpake3SessionKeyResponse;
020import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.Jpake4KeyConfirmationResponse;
021import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
022import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
023import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
024import java.security.SecureRandom;
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.Arrays;
027import java.util.List;
028import io.particle.crypto.EcJpake;
029
030public class JpakeAuthBuilder {
031    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(JpakeAuthBuilder.class);
032
033    private String pairingCode;
034    private List<Message> sentMessages;
035    private List<Message> receivedMessages;
036    byte[] clientRound1;
037    byte[] serverRound1;
038    byte[] clientRound2;
039    byte[] serverRound2;
040    byte[] derivedSecret;
041    byte[] serverNonce3;
042    byte[] clientNonce4;
043    byte[] serverHashDigest4;
044    byte[] serverNonce4;
045    private EcJpake cli;
046    private SecureRandom rand;
047
048    JpakeStep step;
049
050    public JpakeAuthBuilder(String pairingCode, JpakeStep step, byte[] clientRound1, byte[] serverRound1, byte[] clientRound2, byte[] serverRound2, byte[] derivedSecret, SecureRandom rand) {
051        this.pairingCode = pairingCode;
052        this.cli = new EcJpake(EcJpake.Role.CLIENT, pairingCodeToBytes(pairingCode), rand);
053        this.sentMessages = new ArrayList<>();
054        this.receivedMessages = new ArrayList<>();
055
056        this.step = step;
057        this.clientRound1 = clientRound1;
058        this.serverRound1 = serverRound1;
059        this.clientRound2 = clientRound2;
060        this.serverRound2 = serverRound2;
061        this.derivedSecret = derivedSecret;
062        this.rand = rand;
063    }
064
065    public JpakeAuthBuilder(String pairingCode) {
066        this(pairingCode, decideInitialStep(null), null, null, null, null, null, new SecureRandom());
067    }
068
069    public JpakeAuthBuilder(String pairingCode, byte[] derivedSecret) {
070        this(pairingCode, decideInitialStep(derivedSecret), null, null, null, null, derivedSecret, new SecureRandom());
071    }
072
073    public JpakeAuthBuilder(String pairingCode, byte[] derivedSecret, SecureRandom random) {
074        this(pairingCode, decideInitialStep(derivedSecret), null, null, null, null, derivedSecret, random);
075    }
076
077    static JpakeStep decideInitialStep(byte[] derivedSecret) {
078        if (derivedSecret == null || derivedSecret.length == 0) {
079            return JpakeStep.BOOTSTRAP_INITIAL;
080        } else {
081            return JpakeStep.CONFIRM_INITIAL;
082        }
083    }
084
085    static byte[] pairingCodeToBytes(String pairingCode) {
086        //return pairingCode.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
087        byte[] ret = new byte[pairingCode.length()]; // should always be 6
088        for (int i=0; i<pairingCode.length(); i++) {
089            ret[i] = charCode(pairingCode.charAt(i));
090        }
091        return ret;
092    }
093
094    static byte charCode(char c) {
095        if (c == '0') return 48;
096        if (c == '1') return 49;
097        if (c == '2') return 50;
098        if (c == '3') return 51;
099        if (c == '4') return 52;
100        if (c == '5') return 53;
101        if (c == '6') return 54;
102        if (c == '7') return 55;
103        if (c == '8') return 56;
104        if (c == '9') return 57;
105        return -1;
106    }
107
108    private static JpakeAuthBuilder INSTANCE = null;
109    public static JpakeAuthBuilder initializeWithPairingCode(String pairingCode) {
110        if (INSTANCE == null || !INSTANCE.pairingCode.equals(pairingCode)) {
111            INSTANCE = new JpakeAuthBuilder(pairingCode, null);
112        }
113        return INSTANCE;
114    }
115
116    public static JpakeAuthBuilder initializeWithDerivedSecret(String pairingCode, byte[] derivedSecret) {
117        INSTANCE = new JpakeAuthBuilder(pairingCode, derivedSecret);
118        return INSTANCE;
119    }
120
121    public static JpakeAuthBuilder getInstance() {
122        if (INSTANCE == null) {
123            throw new IllegalArgumentException("JPAKE auth session does not exist");
124        }
125        return INSTANCE;
126    }
127
128    public static void clearInstance() {
129        INSTANCE = null;
130    }
131
132    public Message nextRequest() {
133        Message request;
134        if (step == JpakeStep.BOOTSTRAP_INITIAL) {
135            this.clientRound1 = this.cli.getRound1();
136            byte[] challenge = Arrays.copyOfRange(this.clientRound1, 0, 165);
137
138            log.debug("Req1a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(challenge));
139            request = new Jpake1aRequest(0, challenge);
140
141            step = JpakeStep.ROUND_1A_SENT;
142        } else if (step == JpakeStep.ROUND_1A_RECEIVED) {
143            byte[] challenge = Arrays.copyOfRange(this.clientRound1, 165, 330);
144
145            log.debug("Req1b: " + Hex.encodeHexString(challenge));
146            request = new Jpake1bRequest(0, challenge);
147
148            step = JpakeStep.ROUND_1B_SENT;
149        } else if (step == JpakeStep.ROUND_1B_RECEIVED) {
150            this.clientRound2 = this.cli.getRound2();
151            byte[] challenge = Arrays.copyOfRange(this.clientRound2, 0, 165);
152            log.debug("Req2: " + Hex.encodeHexString(challenge));
153            request = new Jpake2Request(0, challenge);
154
155            step = JpakeStep.ROUND_2_SENT;
156        } else if (step == JpakeStep.ROUND_2_RECEIVED) {
157            request = new Jpake3SessionKeyRequest(0);
158
159            this.derivedSecret = this.cli.deriveSecret();
160            log.debug("Req3 DerivedSecret=" + Hex.encodeHexString(derivedSecret));
161
162            step = JpakeStep.CONFIRM_3_SENT;
163        } else if (step == JpakeStep.CONFIRM_INITIAL) {
164            request = new Jpake3SessionKeyRequest(0);
165
166            step = JpakeStep.CONFIRM_3_SENT;
167        } else if (step == JpakeStep.CONFIRM_3_RECEIVED) {
168            this.clientNonce4 = generateNonce();
169            byte[] hashDigest3 = HmacSha256.hmacSha256(clientNonce4, Hkdf.build(serverNonce3, derivedSecret));
170
171            log.debug("Req4: clientNonce4=" + Hex.encodeHexString(clientNonce4));
172            log.debug("Req4: derivedSecret=" + Hex.encodeHexString(derivedSecret));
173            log.debug("Req4: serverNonce3=" + Hex.encodeHexString(serverNonce3));
174            log.debug("Req4: hashDigest3=" + Hex.encodeHexString(hashDigest3));
175            request = new Jpake4KeyConfirmationRequest(0,
176                    clientNonce4,
177                    Jpake4KeyConfirmationRequest.RESERVED,
178                    hashDigest3
179            );
180
181            step = JpakeStep.CONFIRM_4_SENT;
182        } else if (step == JpakeStep.CONFIRM_4_RECEIVED) {
183            byte[] hashDigest4 = HmacSha256.hmacSha256(serverNonce4, Hkdf.build(serverNonce3, derivedSecret));
184            if (Hex.encodeHexString(this.serverHashDigest4).equals(Hex.encodeHexString(hashDigest4))) {
185                log.info("JpakeAuthBuilder HMAC SECRET VALIDATES");
186                step = JpakeStep.COMPLETE;
187            } else {
188                log.warn("JpakeAuthBuilder HMAC SECRET DOES NOT VALIDATE hashDigest=" + Hex.encodeHexString(hashDigest4));
189                log.warn("serverNonce4=" + Hex.encodeHexString(this.serverNonce4));
190                log.warn("derivedSecret=" + Hex.encodeHexString(this.derivedSecret));
191                log.warn("serverHashDigest4=" + Hex.encodeHexString(this.serverHashDigest4));
192                step = JpakeStep.INVALID;
193            }
194
195            return null;
196        } else {
197            return null;
198        }
199
200        this.sentMessages.add(request);
201        return request;
202    }
203
204    public void processResponse(Message response) {
205        this.receivedMessages.add(response);
206        if (response instanceof Jpake1aResponse) {
207            Jpake1aResponse m = (Jpake1aResponse) response;
208            log.debug("Res1a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getCentralChallengeHash()));
209            this.serverRound1 = m.getCentralChallengeHash();
210
211            step = JpakeStep.ROUND_1A_RECEIVED;
212        } else if (response instanceof Jpake1bResponse) {
213            Jpake1bResponse m = (Jpake1bResponse) response;
214            log.debug("Res1b: " + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getCentralChallengeHash()));
215            byte[] fullServerRound1 = Bytes.combine(this.serverRound1, m.getCentralChallengeHash());
216            log.debug("FULL_ROUND_1_RESPONSE: " + Hex.encodeHexString(fullServerRound1));
217            this.serverRound1 = fullServerRound1;
218
219            this.cli.readRound1(fullServerRound1);
220            step = JpakeStep.ROUND_1B_RECEIVED;
221        } else if (response instanceof Jpake2Response) {
222            Jpake2Response m = (Jpake2Response) response;
223            log.debug("Res2: " + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getCentralChallengeHash()));
224            this.serverRound2 = m.getCentralChallengeHash();
225            log.debug("FULL_ROUND_2_RESPONSE: " + Hex.encodeHexString(this.serverRound2));
226
227            this.cli.readRound2(this.serverRound2);
228            step = JpakeStep.ROUND_2_RECEIVED;
229        } else if (response instanceof Jpake3SessionKeyResponse) {
230            Jpake3SessionKeyResponse m = (Jpake3SessionKeyResponse) response;
231            log.debug("Res3: nonce=" + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getDeviceKeyNonce()));
232            log.debug("Res3: reserved=" + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getDeviceKeyReserved()));
233
234            this.serverNonce3 = m.getDeviceKeyNonce();
235            step = JpakeStep.CONFIRM_3_RECEIVED;
236        } else if (response instanceof Jpake4KeyConfirmationResponse) {
237            Jpake4KeyConfirmationResponse m = (Jpake4KeyConfirmationResponse) response;
238            log.debug("JpakeAuthBuilder Res4: nonce=" + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getHashDigest()) + " hashDigest=" + Hex.encodeHexString(m.getNonce()));
239
240            this.serverNonce4 = m.getNonce();
241            this.serverHashDigest4 = m.getHashDigest();
242            step = JpakeStep.CONFIRM_4_RECEIVED;
243        }
244    }
245
246    byte[] generateNonce() {
247        byte[] nonce = new byte[8];
248        this.rand.nextBytes(nonce);
249        return nonce;
250    }
251
252    public enum JpakeStep {
253        BOOTSTRAP_INITIAL,
254        ROUND_1A_SENT,
255        ROUND_1A_RECEIVED,
256        ROUND_1B_SENT,
257        ROUND_1B_RECEIVED,
258        ROUND_2_SENT,
259        ROUND_2_RECEIVED,
260        CONFIRM_INITIAL,
261        CONFIRM_3_SENT,
262        CONFIRM_3_RECEIVED,
263        CONFIRM_4_SENT,
264        CONFIRM_4_RECEIVED,
265        COMPLETE,
266        INVALID
267    }
268
269    public boolean done() {
270        return step == JpakeStep.COMPLETE;
271    }
272
273    public boolean invalid() {
274        return step == JpakeStep.INVALID;
275    }
276
277    public byte[] getDerivedSecret() {
278        return this.derivedSecret;
279    }
280
281    public byte[] getServerNonce() {
282        return this.serverNonce3;
283    }
284}
